verses.verse: וּמֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> u-mo-Sheh, Now Moses הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become רֹעֶ֛ה <WH7462> ro-'Eh was pasturing אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֹ֛אן <WH6629> tzon the flock יִתְר֥וֹ <WH3503> yit-Ro of Jethro חֹתְנ֖וֹ <WH2859> cho-te-No his father in law כֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> ko-Hen the priest מִדְיָ֑ן <WH4080> mid-Yan; of Midian וַיִּנְהַ֤ג <WH5090> vai-yin-Hag and he led אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַצֹּאן֙ <WH6629> hatz-tzoN the flock אַחַ֣ר <WH310> 'a-Char to the backside הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> ham-mid-Bar, of the desert וַיָּבֹ֛א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo and came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַ֥ר <WH2022> har to the mountain הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God חֹרֵֽבָה׃ <WH2722> cho-Re-vah. [even] to Horeb

וַ֠יֵּרָא <WH7200> Vai-ye-ra appeared מַלְאַ֨ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach And the angel יְהֹוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> 'e-Lav unto בְּלַבַּת־ <WH3827> be-lab-bat- unto him in a flame אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> 'esh of fire מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch out of the midst הַסְּנֶ֑ה <WH5572> has-se-Neh; of a bush וַיַּ֗רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar, and he looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold הַסְּנֶה֙ <WH5572> has-se-Neh and behold the bush בֹּעֵ֣ר <WH1197> bo-'Er burned בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh, with fire וְהַסְּנֶ֖ה <WH5572> ve-has-se-Neh and the bush אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> 'ei-Nen-nu was not אֻכָּֽל׃ <WH398> 'uk-Kal. [was] not consumed

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses אָסֻֽרָה־ <WH5493> 'a-su-rah- I will now turn aside נָּ֣א <WH4994> na now וְאֶרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> ve-'er-'Eh, and see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמַּרְאֶ֥ה <WH4758> ham-mar-'Eh sight הַגָּדֹ֖ל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol this great הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; this מַדּ֖וּעַ <WH4069> mad-Du-a' why לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- is not יִבְעַ֥ר <WH1197> yiv-'Ar is not burnt הַסְּנֶֽה׃ <WH5572> has-se-Neh. the bush

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar saw יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And when the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for סָ֣ר <WH5493> sar that he turned aside לִרְא֑וֹת <WH7200> lir-'ot; to see וַיִּקְרָא֩ <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called אֵלָ֨יו <WH413> 'e-Lav about אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch unto him out of the midst הַסְּנֶ֗ה <WH5572> has-se-Neh, of the bush וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> hin-Ne-ni. Here

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> tik-Rav Draw not nigh הֲלֹ֑ם <WH1988> ha-Lom; hither שַׁל־ <WH5394> shal- put off נְעָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5275> ne-'a-Lei-cha thy shoes מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al from רַגְלֶ֔יךָ <WH7272> rag-Lei-cha, from off thy feet כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom, for the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whereon אַתָּה֙ <WH859> 'at-Tah you עוֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> o-Med thou standest עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav, and אַדְמַת־ <WH127> 'ad-mat- ground קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. He

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, Moreover he said אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei I [am] the God אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha, of thy father אֱלֹהֵ֧י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> yitz-Chak of Isaac וֵאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> ve-lo-Hei and the God יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko; of Jacob וַיַּסְתֵּ֤ר <WH5641> vai-yas-Ter hid מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> pa-Nav, his face כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for יָרֵ֔א <WH3372> ya-Re, for he was afraid מֵהַבִּ֖יט <WH5027> me-hab-Bit to look אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- at הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him. upon God

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, And the LORD רָאֹ֥ה <WH7200> ra-'Oh I have surely רָאִ֛יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti seen אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֳנִ֥י <WH6040> 'o-Ni the affliction עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> 'am-Mi of my people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> be-mitz-Ra-yim; which [are] in Egypt וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et צַעֲקָתָ֤ם <WH6818> tza-'a-ka-Tam their cry שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ti and have heard מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei by reason נֹֽגְשָׂ֔יו <WH5065> no-ge-Sav, of their taskmasters כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for יָדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> ya-Da'-ti for I know אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַכְאֹבָֽיו׃ <WH4341> mach-'o-Vav. their sorrows

וָאֵרֵ֞ד <WH3381> va-'e-Red And I am come down לְהַצִּיל֣וֹ׀ <WH5337> le-hatz-tzi-Lo to deliver מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> mi-Yad them out of the hand מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4713> mitz-Ra-yim, Egyptian וּֽלְהַעֲלֹתוֹ֮ <WH5927> u-le-ha-'a-lo-To and to bring מִן־ <WH4480> min- that הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz them up out of that land הַהִוא֒ <WH1931> ha-hi-V he אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz land טוֹבָה֙ <WH2896> to-Vah unto a good וּרְחָבָ֔ה <WH7342> u-re-cha-Vah, and a large אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz unto a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> za-Vat flowing חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <WH1706> u-de-Vash; and honey אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מְק֤וֹם <WH4725> me-Kom unto the place הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni of the Canaanites וְהַ֣חִתִּ֔י <WH2850> ve-Ha-chit-Ti, and the Hittites וְהָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> ve-ha-'e-mo-Ri and the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi, and the Perizzites וְהַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> ve-ha-chiv-Vi and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> ve-hay-vu-Si. and the Jebusites

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah Now הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> hin-Neh behold צַעֲקַ֥ת <WH6818> tza-'a-Kat Now therefore behold the cry בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בָּ֣אָה <WH935> Ba-'ah is come אֵלָ֑י <WH413> 'e-Lai; to me וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- furthermore רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> ra-'I-ti unto me and I have also seen אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַלַּ֔חַץ <WH3906> hal-La-chatz, the oppression אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4713> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian לֹחֲצִ֥ים <WH3905> lo-cha-Tzim oppress אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> 'o-Tam.

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah now לְכָ֔ה <WH1980> le-Chah, come וְאֶֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֖ <WH7971> ve-'esh-la-cha-Cha now therefore and I will send אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> par-'Oh; thee unto Pharaoh וְהוֹצֵ֛א <WH3318> ve-ho-Tze that thou mayest bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> 'am-Mi my people בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. out of Egypt

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, unto God מִ֣י <WH4310> mi Who אָנֹ֔כִי <WH595> 'a-No-chi, I כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki should אֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> 'e-Lech go אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> par-'Oh; unto Pharaoh וְכִ֥י <WH3588> ve-Chi should אוֹצִ֛יא <WH3318> o-Tzi and that I should bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. Egypt

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- unto thee that אֶֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh become עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> 'im-Mach, you וְזֶה־ <WH2088> ve-zeh- and this לְּךָ֣ le-Cha הָא֔וֹת <WH226> ha-'ot, Certainly I will be with thee and this [shall be] a token כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki Certainly אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi is i שְׁלַחְתִּ֑יךָ <WH7971> she-lach-Ti-cha; I have sent בְּהוֹצִֽיאֲךָ֤ <WH3318> be-ho-tzi-'a-Cha thee When thou hast brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am the people מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt תַּֽעַבְדוּן֙ <WH5647> ta-'av-Dun ye shall serve אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, God עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al and הָהָ֥ר <WH2022> ha-Har upon this mountain הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָֽאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, unto God הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I בָא֮ <WH935> va Behold [when] I come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְאָמַרְתִּ֣י <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ti and shall say לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei unto them The God אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> a-vo-tei-Chem of your fathers שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <WH7971> she-la-Cha-ni hath sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem; to וְאָֽמְרוּ־ <WH559> ve-'a-me-ru- me unto you and they shall say לִ֣י li מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What שְּׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo, to me מָ֥ה <WH4100> mah What אֹמַ֖ר <WH559> 'o-Mar say אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <WH413> 'a-le-Hem. about

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, unto Moses אֶֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh I AM אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher WHO אֶֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh; THAT I AM וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, and he said כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus תֹאמַר֙ <WH559> to-Mar Thus shalt thou say לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh I am שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <WH7971> she-la-Cha-ni I AM hath sent אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem. about

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer said ע֨וֹד <WH5750> od moreover אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, unto Moses כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus תֹאמַר֮ <WH559> to-Mar Thus shalt thou say אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1> 'a-vo-tei-Chem, of your fathers אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִצְחָ֛ק <WH3327> yitz-Chak of Isaac וֵאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> ve-lo-Hei and the God יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <WH7971> she-la-Cha-ni hath sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem; to זֶה־ <WH2088> zeh- This שְּׁמִ֣י <WH8034> she-Mi me unto you this [is] my name לְעֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam, for ever וְזֶ֥ה <WH2088> ve-Zeh and this זִכְרִ֖י <WH2143> zich-Ri and this [is] my memorial לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> le-Dor unto all דֹּֽר׃ <WH1755> Dor. generations
